Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
A liberated Indentured seeks to restore the name of his House.
一位获得了自由的契约者想要恢复自己家族的名誉。
"House" as in Syndicate noble house. Indentured is a Syndicate unit in the game.

The bigger they are, the harder they fall. House Faron was once great among the Syndicate, respected by its rivals and feared by its enemies. Until the unthinkable happened, and my grandfather brought poverty and shame to our family. We were dispossessed, banned from business and our bloodline sold into slavery. I served our sentence as an Indentured soldier, fighting foreign wars until my freedom would be earned.
站得越高，摔得越狠。法隆家族曾经是辛迪加中的佼佼者，对手尊重我们，敌人畏惧我们。但是，令人意想不到的事情发生了。我的祖父给家族带来了贫穷和耻辱。我们的财产被剥夺，失去了经商的权利，我们的血脉也沦为了奴隶。我以契约者士兵的身份服从刑役，在外星不断征战，直到重获自由。
"House Faron" is the name of a Syndicate noble house.
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate

In my misery, I’ve found the most unlikely of all companions: a re-enslaved Kir’Ko! Though his fate was worse than mine, Hatyl Es’Ran’s spirits were high and his will unbroken. He told me of the ancient Es’Teq, who had chosen him as their Prophet and could lead my family to redemption. At first, I laughed at him, but when he drained the very Essence from one of our Overseers, the situation changed. Together, we made our escape.
在我经受苦难之际，我遇见了一位最不可思议的同伴：一个再次遭到奴役的奇尔寇人！虽然哈泰尔·埃斯兰的命运比我还要凄惨，但他斗志昂扬，意志坚定。他向我讲述了有关古老的埃斯特克人的故事，自己是怎样成为了他们的先知，并且告诉我他能够带领我的家族走向救赎。起初，我只是嘲笑他的痴心妄想，但当他吸干了一名监管者的精华时，情况就发生了改变。最后，我们一起逃了出去。

"Hatyl Es'Ran" is the name of a male Kir'Ko character. "Es'Teq" is the name of an ancient human theocratic dynasty. "Prophet" is a title within the Es'Teq religion. "Essence" is a term for life essence used by the Es'Teq. It is also present in inanimate objects, and machinery. "Overseer" is the name of a Syndicate unit in the game.
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate

My new ranks filled with liberated Indentured and exiles continue to grow. We are now on our way to Obolus-5, a planet once famous for its rich history and ruins. At least officially, but away from touristic attractions, adventurers and raiders from all across the Union followed the allure of the past and its secrets. According to Hatyl Es’Ran, this is where the Es’Teq went into hiding many millennia ago.
我的新军队中全都是获得了自由的契约者和流亡者，并且人数还在不断增加。我们正在前往奥博罗斯 5 号星球，那里曾经以丰富的历史和大量的废墟而闻名，至少官方的说辞如此。然而，在远离那些旅游景点的地方，来自全联盟的冒险者和掠夺者都在这个星球的诱惑下，前来寻找过去的秘密。根据哈泰尔·埃斯兰的说法，这里正是埃斯特克人在几千年前躲藏起来的地方。
"Obolus-5" is the name of a planet. "Union" refers to the Star Union.
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate

Obolus-5 is in visual range. I see why so many treasure hunters were once drawn here: the entire planet seems to breathe mystery. Despite all this, the Es’Teq have never been found. Sounds like unearthing their history will require more than some old-fashioned tomb-raiding…
奥博罗斯 5 号星已经近在眼前了。现在，我终于明白为什么会有这么多的寻宝者被吸引来到了这里：整个星球似乎都透露着神秘的气息。尽管如此，埃斯特克人却从来没有被人发现过。看来，想要挖掘出他们的历史，仅仅依靠传统的盗墓手段是远远不够的…
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Find the legacy of the Es'Teq

Opening the Regenesis Ark was an act of divine providence. As the beacon was lit its echoing signal spread to all Star Union worlds, releasing billions of Es’Teq minds from their ancient slumber. I, myself, became joined with their High Lord Xito Rhemenses. By accepting my role as Heritor Prophet, I will bring redemption not only to my own House, but to the sinners of other cultures and races alike.
打开再生方舟乃是神圣的天意之举。当信标被点亮之际，它的回声信号传播到了所有的星际联盟星球，唤醒了无数在远古中沉睡的灵魂。而我，也加入了他们的至尊领主西托·雷蒙瑟斯。我接受了继承者先知的身份，我不仅将为我自己的家族，还将为所有遭受了同样命运的种族罪孽之人带去救赎。
"High Lord" is a religious title of the Es'Teq and the name of an Es'Teq unit in the game. "Xito Rhemenses" is the name of a male human character. "Regenesis Ark" is the name of an Es'Teq artifact.
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
On a Nexus Node gone dark, the Es'Teq face their old nemesis.
一个通讯节点失去了作用，埃斯特克人遇见了他们古老的敌人。
For "Nexus Node" see the entry on the Nexus Network in the glossary.
Litany of the Es'Teq, chapter 37 verse 28
埃斯特克祷文，第 37 章第 28 节

Before Artok, the Creator, there was darkness in the universe. No matter or antimatter, only Entropy. But then Artok ignited the spark of creation, splitting his body into shards of Essence from which all life became born. We Es’Teq inherited his holy Essence, collecting and preserving it inside the pure until our God can be restored. Together we will build a paradise anchored in reality, where we ward off Entropy, and death is a stranger to all believers.
在造物主阿尔托克之前，宇宙中只有黑暗，没有任何物质或反物质，只有混沌。后来，阿尔托克点燃了创造的火花，将自己的身体分裂成了无数精华的碎片，一切生命由此诞生。我们埃斯特克人继承了他神圣的精华，收集并将它们储存在纯净之内，直到我们的神明得以复原。我们将携手共同建立一个扎根于现实的天堂。在那里，我们将抵御混沌，而我们的信徒永远也不会灭亡。
"Artok" is the name of a male god that the Es'Teq believe in.
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Litany of the Es'Teq, chapter 37 verse 43
埃斯特克祷文，第 37 章第 43 节

But there are always those that blindly oppose divine rule. With the creation of artificial intelligence, the greatest sin against the sanctity of life was born. The mundane temptations of a virtual life corrupted the gullible masses, denying them any salvation within this reality. After their last holy war, the Es’Teq were forced to retreat. But now that Regenesis has occurred, the culling of AI can be resumed.
但是，总有一些人盲目地反对神圣的统治。随着人工智能的诞生，危害生命神圣的罪孽也随之出现了。虚拟生活的世俗诱惑腐蚀了轻信的众生，剥夺了他们在现实中获得救赎的机会。当最后一次圣战结束之后，埃斯特克人被迫撤退。但是现在，再生已经来临，我们将继续铲除一切人工智能。
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Litany of the Es'Teq, chapter 37 verse 47
埃斯特克祷文，第 37 章第 47 节

All of this was revealed to me through my symbiont, Xito Rhemenses. He is guiding me to CNex Omega, the Union’s infamous center of cyber-crime, from where traffickers and Outlander rebels once launched most of their hacker attacks. After the Cataclysm, more ambitious forces took over the planet: there is word of a new master AI being created, another CORE to dominate us all! If this is true, I can only pray we arrive in time for a divine intervention.
所有的一切都通过我的共生者西托·雷蒙瑟斯揭示于我。他指引我前往西奈克斯欧米茄这一星际联盟臭名昭著的网络犯罪中心，非法买卖者和拓荒者叛军曾在这里发动起过大规模的黑客攻击。大灾变之后，一支野心更大的部队占据了这个星球。传闻称一个新的主控人工智正在此处形成，又是一个想要支配所有人的“核心”！如果这是真的，我只能祈祷我们能够及时赶到那里并进行神圣的干预。
"CNex Omega" is the name of a planet. For "Outlander", "Cataclysm" and "CORE" see the respective entries in the glossary.
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Litany of the Es'Teq, chapter 37 verse 50
埃斯特克祷文，第 37 章第 50 节

CNex Omega is engulfed in a red web of rogue satellites, greeting us with the looping transmissions of long-dead hackers. It is often said that even history keeps repeating itself. But not this time: We will purge the AI followers and their new CORE from this world!
西奈克斯欧米茄星被一张失控卫星释放出的红色巨网所笼罩，我们只能接收到已经死去了很久的黑客们一遍又一遍重复发来的信息。人们常说，历史总是在不断重演。但这次不会，因为我们将把所有的人工智能追随者和他们新的“核心”从这个星球中铲除！
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Infiltrate CNex Omega with the Heritor technology
利用继承者科技侵入西奈克斯欧米茄星球
Find and delete the new CORE AI
找到并删除新的“核心”人工智能
Litany of the Es'Teq, chapter 38 verse 1
埃斯特克祷文，第 38 章第 1 节

The sky shimmered like a heavenly dome as the Elevation Crystal started to breathe new circulating Essence into the veins of the Nexus Network. I was there, at the heart of the communion, listening to the voices of the faithful from all across the galaxy. Molded by the Es’Teq Conclave, their chant grew into an angelic chorus, ready to spread the words of salvation. Anyone touched by its lucent grace will either join in or perish.
当晋升水晶向通讯网络注入新的流动精华时，天空如同一个神圣的穹顶闪闪发亮。我就站在通灵的中心，聆听着来自星系各处的信徒之声。在埃斯特克秘会的影响下，他们的吟唱逐渐汇成了一首天国的合唱，传播着救赎的箴言。凡是被这等光辉的恩赐触动之人，要么将会加入，要么将会消亡。
"Elevation Crystal" is the name of an Es'Teq artifact. "Es'Teq Conclave" is the name of a religious tribunal of the Es'Teq.
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate

With the destruction of the Omega Server the followers of the AI and the Es’Teq have both been denied their weapon of mass conversion. No belief or doctrine should be forced upon anybody, but can only develop through reflection and gnosis. I have learned this from Hatyl Es’Ran, who has encouraged me to continue our reformation of the Es’Teq faith. Kir’Ko and Syndicate, host and symbiont – all can prosper as long as each mind retains its freedom.
欧米茄服务器被摧毁之后，人工智能的追随者和埃斯特克人都失去了转化大众信仰的武器。任何信仰或教义都不应该强加于任何人，只能通过反思和真知来发展。我从哈泰尔·埃斯兰身上学到了这一点，也正是他一直鼓励我继续对埃斯特克的信仰进行变革。无论是奇尔寇还是辛迪加，是宿主还是共生者，只要思想保持自由，就能繁荣昌盛。
"Omega Server" is the name of a Synthesis server build on CNex Omega.
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate

General Loca Notes for this XML: For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
In the text below, text is spoken by a character who can be either male or female (except for Amazon, which is always female). If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
